mapper.select: select b.FID as id, b.FNAME as title, b.FNUMBER as num, b.FMainContractNumber as mainNumber, t.FNAME_L2 as contractType, b.FCOSTPROPERTY as contractNature, b.FBOOKEDDATE as bizDate, s.FNAME_L2 as partB, b.FORIGINALAMOUNT as originalAmount, b.FAMOUNT as amount, cu.fname_l2 as currencyName, ad.FNAME_L2 as deptName, b.FREMARK as remark from T_CON_CONTRACTBILL b left join T_FDC_ContractType t on t.fid = b.FCONTRACTTYPEID left join T_BD_SUPPLIER s on s.fid = b.FPARTBID left join T_BD_CURRENCY cu on cu.fid=b.FCURRENCYID left join T_ORG_ADMIN ad on ad.fid=b.FCREATEDEPTID where b.FMAINCONTRACTNUMBER = #{number}

select cb.FID id,cb.fbookeddate bizDate,cb.FState state,cb.FHasSettled hasSettled,ct.fname_l2 as conTypeName, cb.fnumber num,cb.FNAME as conName,pc.fname_l2 as hygh,cb.FProgrammingContract as hyghId, cb.fmaincontractnumber as mainNumber,cb.famount as amount,pc.FAMOUNT as balance, cur.fname_l2 curName,cb.FSrcAmount srcAmount,cb.FOriginalAmount originalAmount, supb.fname_l2 as partBName,supc.fname_l2 as partCName,cs.FNAME_L2 as csName, cb.fsigndate signDate,oa.fname_l2 as deptName,p.fname_l2 as personName,oaa.FNAME_L2 creatDept, ldp.fname_l2 as partAName,cb.FCostProperty costProperty,cb.FContractPropert contractNature, cb.FIsArchived isArchived, u.fname_l2 auditor,cb.FLastUpdateTime lastAuditTime,uc.fname_l2 as creator, cb.fcreatetime createTime,cb.FIsRespite isRespite,cb.FCONTRACTTYPEID as conTypeId, cp.FNAME_L2 as projectName,un.FNAME_L2 as orgName,cb.FISCOSTSPLIT as isCost, (select count(ass.fid) from T_BAS_BoAttchAsso ass where ass.FBOID=cb.fid) as attNums from T_CON_ContractBill cb left join T_FDC_ContractType ct on cb.FContractTypeID=ct.fid left join T_CON_ProgrammingContract pc on pc.fid=cb.FProgrammingContract left join T_BD_Currency cur on cur.fid=cb.FCurrencyID left join T_BD_Supplier supb on supb.fid=cb.FPartBID left join T_BD_Supplier supc on supc.fid=cb.FPartCID left join T_FDC_ContractSource cs on cs.fid=cb.FContractSourceId left join T_BD_Person p on p.fid=cb.FRespPersonID left join T_FDC_CURPROJECT cp on cp.fid=cb.FCURPROJECTID left join T_ORG_BASEUNIT un on un.fid=cp.FFULLORGUNIT left join T_ORG_Admin oa on oa.fid=cb.FRespDeptID left join T_ORG_Admin oaa on oaa.fid=cb.FCreateDeptID left join T_FDC_LandDeveloper ldp on ldp.fid=cb.FLandDeveloperID left join T_PM_User u on u.fid=cb.FAuditorID left join T_PM_USER uc on uc.fid=cb.FCreatorID
cp.FFULLORGUNIT=#{orgId}
and cb.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and #{bookDate} < cb.fbookeddate and cb.fbookeddate <= #{bizDate}
and cb.FState like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{state}),'%')
and ct.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{conTypeName}),'%')
and ct.fid in
#{item}
and cb.fname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{conName}),'%')
and supb.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{partB}),'%')
and p.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{personName}),'%')
and oa.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{deptName}),'%')
and uc.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{creator}),'%')
and oaa.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{creatDept}),'%')
and p.fnumber =#{authorNum} or uc.fnumber=#{authorNum}
and cb.FCurProjectID in
#{item}
order by cb.fbookeddate desc ,cb.fnumber desc
select FParentID from T_FDC_CurProject where fid=#{projectId}
select fid from T_FDC_CurProject where FPARENTID=#{projectId}
select fid from T_FDC_ContractType where fparentid=#{conTypeId}
select FID from T_BD_PERSON where fnumber = #{number}
select FID from T_ORG_BASEUNIT where FNUMBER = #{number}
select fid from T_CON_BANKNUM where FNUMBER = #{unionBankNum}

select cb.FID id,cb.fbookeddate bizDate,cb.FState state,cb.FHasSettled hasSettled,ct.fname_l2 as conTypeName, cb.fnumber num,cb.FNAME as conName,pc.fname_l2 as hygh,cb.FPROGRAMMINGCONTRACT as hyghId, cb.fmaincontractnumber as mainNumber,cur.fname_l2 curName,cb.FSrcAmount srcAmount,cb.FOriginalAmount originalAmount, cb.famount amount,supb.fname_l2 as partBName,supc.fname_l2 as partCName,cs.fname_l2 as csName, cb.fsigndate signDate,oa.fname_l2 as deptName,p.fname_l2 as personName,oaa.FNAME_L2 creatDept, ldp.fname_l2 as partA,cb.FCostProperty costProperty,cb.FContractPropert contractNature, cb.FIsArchived isArchived, u.fname_l2 auditor,cb.FLastUpdateTime lastAuditTime,uc.fname_l2 as creator, cb.fcreatetime createTime,cb.FIsRespite isRespite,cp.FNAME_L2 as projectName,cb.FISCOSTSPLIT as isCost from T_CON_ContractBill cb left join T_FDC_ContractType ct on cb.FContractTypeID=ct.fid left join T_CON_ProgrammingContract pc on pc.fid=cb.FProgrammingContract left join T_BD_Currency cur on cur.fid=cb.FCurrencyID left join T_BD_Supplier supb on supb.fid=cb.FPartBID left join T_BD_Supplier supc on supc.fid=cb.FPartCID left join T_FDC_CURPROJECT cp on cp.fid=cb.FCURPROJECTID left join T_FDC_ContractSource cs on cs.fid=cb.FContractSourceId left join T_BD_Person p on p.fid=cb.FRespPersonID left join T_ORG_Admin oa on oa.fid=cb.FRespDeptID left join T_ORG_Admin oaa on oaa.fid=cb.FCreateDeptID left join T_FDC_LandDeveloper ldp on ldp.fid=cb.FLandDeveloperID left join T_PM_User u on u.fid=cb.FAuditorID left join T_PM_USER uc on uc.fid=cb.FCreatorID where cb.fid=#{id}

select fid from T_PM_USER where FNUMBER=#{number}
